title: Rational Function - finding zeros with technology

content.question: ​The rational function <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x cubed minus 4 x plus 3 over denominator x to the power of 4 plus 2 x minus 4 end fraction"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>. For what values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> does <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals 0"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="x equals negative 2.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2.303</mn></math>​ and <math alttext="x equals 1.000"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.000</mn></math> only
​<math alttext="x equals negative 1.643"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.643</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 1.144"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.144</mn></math> only

​<math alttext="x equals negative 2.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2.303</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.000"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.000</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 1.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.303</mn></math> only

<math alttext="x equals negative 2.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2.303</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals negative 1.643"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1.643</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.000"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.000</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.303</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 1.144"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.144</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="x equals negative 2.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2.303</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals 1.000"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.000</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 1.303"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.303</mn></math> only

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
